org.opentrafficsim.core.value

Class AbstractValue<U extends Unit<U>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentrafficsim.core.value.AbstractValue<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - the unit of the values in the constructor and for display
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Value<U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleMatrix, DoubleVector, FloatMatrix, FloatVector

    public abstract class AbstractValue<U extends Unit<U>>
extends Object
implements Value<U>, Serializable
    AbstractValue is a class to help construct Matrix, Complex, and Vector but it does not extend java.lang.Number. The Scalar class does extend Number, and implements the same interfaces from Value.
